snippet.title: Replacing the Pac-12 South's early entries
snippet.description: The Pac-12 has 26 of the 98 early entrants in the NFL draft. That's impressive. Some players are locks to get drafted. Others might have jumped the gun a bit and find themselves on practice squads or brushing up on their Canadian. We'll see. What ...
